name: Precision Fan Techniques
description: Learn precise fan control, wrist articulation, and dynamic fan openings for maximum visual effect.

cards.title: Snap Open
cards.description: A quick wrist flick to open the fan instantly with a strong visual impact.
bulletpoints: Hold the fan loosely before the flick
Use a sharp, controlled wrist movement
Ensure full extension for maximum effect
cards.summaryText: Snap the fan open with a crisp flick so the reveal lands like a spotlight.

cards.title: Wrist Twist Flourish
cards.description: A rotational movement that creates a fluid spinning motion with the fan.
bulletpoints: Rotate the wrist smoothly while holding the fan
Use small circles to maintain momentum
Experiment with both clockwise and counterclockwise motions
cards.summaryText: Roll gentle wrist circles to keep the fan gliding in endless flourishes.
